name: Trivy
description: Comprehensive security scanner — container images, filesystems, git repos, SBOM generation

tools: scan_image — Scan a container image for vulnerabilities
scan_filesystem — Scan local filesystem for vulnerabilities
generate_sbom — Generate Software Bill of Materials

setup_steps: 1. Install Trivy: brew install trivy (or apt-get install trivy)
2. No API key needed — uses local vulnerability database
3. Database updates automatically on first run
4. For private registries: configure Docker credentials
security_notes: Trivy runs entirely locally — no data sent to external services
Vulnerability DB downloaded once, updated periodically
Zero cost, zero auth, zero risk — best tool for getting started
Container scanning requires Docker or registry access
